title: How to recognize Islamic art (Penguin Art Ebook).pdf
description:
How to Recognize Islamic Art
Penguin Books | 1979 | ISBN: 0140052380 | English | 68 pages | PDF | 12 MB

Spread by lightning-swift conquests in the seventh and eighth centuries, Islam enveloped many different cultures from India to Spain. Only gradually did these various cultures come to share a common artistic styleÃ¢â‚¬â€a fusion of influences from a vast social and geographical range. Architecture, metalwork, ceramics, and carpets became the most brilliant expressions of this style and were usually characterized by "infinite pattern,'' an ornate form of interlaced decoration in which no single element was allowed to dominate the design
